Module jonix.common
Package com.tectonica.jonix.common.struct

Class JonixBible

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tectonica.jonix.common.struct.JonixBible
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JonixStruct, Serializable
    public class JonixBible
extends Object
implements JonixStruct, Serializable
    This class is a JonixStruct that represents both Onix2 <Bible> and Onix3 <Bible>.

    It can be retrieved from the composite by invoking its asStruct() method.

    See Also:
